role.argrole: entity arg0 is in contrast to

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 比起) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (DP (DT 各) (CLP (M 组))) (NP (NN 候选人))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 热闹滚滚))))) (PU ，) (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 民进党) (NR 陈水扁)) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (NN 惊人之举)))))
